Articles.Content:
Hello, I am currently playing with an old version of ksp (1.3.0) and I am thinking of updating to a more current version, but I have a question: the more recent versions than the one I currently have consume more computer resources. I would be very grateful if you help me solve my question.

Edited February 1, 2021 by Vanamonde
Fixed formatting.
@NemokspI recommend either 1.3.1 or 1.7.3 as they are both known to be very stable, and are not as resource-heavy as more recent versions.
